en_title: Secretary for Justice's Office to relocate to Justice Place
zh_title: 律政司司長辦公室將遷進律政中心

en: he Secretary for Justice's Office will relocate to 5/F, Main Wing, Justice Place (formerly Central Government Offices), 18 Lower Albert Road, Central, Hong Kong on September 14.
The offices of the following divisions of the Department of Justice (DoJ) and the Law Reform Commission Secretariat have already been relocated to the Main and East Wings of Justice Place:
- International Law Division;
- Law Drafting Division;
- Legal Policy Division;
- Civil Division (except Team 4 and Team 5 of Civil Litigation Unit); and
- Administration and Development Division.
The Prosecutions Division and other DoJ offices will remain at their existing locations until further notice.
The latest telephone directory of the DoJ is available at the following website:
Ends/Friday, Sep 11, 2015
zh: 律政司司長辦公室將於九月十四日遷往香港中環下亞厘畢道18號律政中心（前中區政府合署）中座五樓。
下列律政司科別及法律改革委員會秘書處的辦公室較早前亦已遷往律政中心中座和東座：
－國際法律科；
－法律政策科；
－法律草擬科；
－民事法律科（民事訴訟組第四及第五組除外）；及
－政務及發展科。
刑事檢控科和律政司其餘組別會繼續在原址辦公，直至另行通告。
律政司最新的電話表可參閱以下網址：
